author: cmpilato
msg: (copy_revprops, get_sync_editor): Add and use new 'quiet' parameter.
print notifications if not told to be quiet.

author: sussman
msg: Merge r26405:26463 of trunk to this branch.

author: sussman
msg: Make update editor correctly fetch repository file when it receives copyfrom args.
(close_file):  move to before add_file_with_history(), so it can be called.

author: pburba
msg: Fix edge case bug with subtree merges and skipped paths.
(determine_merges_performed): Before this patch if the first N subtree(s)
processed by this function consisted only of skips no mergeinfo was set on
those subtrees.  But the merge might still be operative, meaning other
sub-trees would get updated mergeinfo, we just can't know for sure within
this function.  So stop trying to be so smart about when to set
mergeinfo on subtrees.  Just set it, while still overriding the mergeinfo
for skipped paths, and let cleanup_noop_merge() handle no-op merges (both
"real" no-ops or merges where every affected path was skipped).
